analyze
White’s knight has jumped to g5 and eyes the tactical trick Nxf7 (forking queen and rook).  
The most principled response: hit the knight while centralizing my own pieces.

[d7d5] opens the center, gives b8-c6 more scope, and attacks the loose knight.
